metaData.title: CIS AWS 1.4 Controls
description: Evaluations on global resources will only be performed in the region eu-central-1.
The Security Hub controls in the other regions will be disabled.

standardId: [IAM.9] MFA should be enabled for the root user
[IAM.6] Hardware MFA should be enabled for the root user
[IAM.16] Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse
[IAM.5] MFA should be enabled for all IAM users that have a console password
[IAM.3] IAM users' access keys should be rotated every 90 days or less
[IAM.15] Ensure IAM password policy requires minimum password length of 14 or greater
[IAM.1] IAM policies should not allow full '*' administrative privileges
[IAM.18] Ensure a support role has been created to manage incidents with Support
disabledStandardControls.disableReason: as global resources will only be evaluated in eu-central-1.
